solPicker.job
Class Oligo

java.lang.Object
  solPicker.job.Oligo

public class Oligo
extends java.lang.Object

Each oligo, with a unique id number, keeps track of its filters and its value for each filter applied to it (e.g. its gc percent). Each oligo contains its sequence, and has methods to compute its lowercase count, n count, gc percent, fail score, et cetera when a filter calls upon it to do so. After an oligo fails a filter, it keeps track of the reason it was rejected.

Version:
$Id: Oligo.html,v 1.3 2009/10/16 23:08:53 tizatt Exp $
Author:
Arjun Chandrasekhar, Tyler Izatt
